channel.title: Open to suggestions
channel.description:
Well i am planning on getting a new tower hopefully sometime soon, i want one i could actually play games on and it should work well? since the one i am using right now is very very shitty...I live in Canada can someone give me some good ideas how much a pretty decent tower would cost ? and the specs and some shit like store..if you live in canada and got an idea?
Yes i dont know shit about computers...

item.title: Open to suggestions

i have three words for you

google

alien-ware

item.title: Open to suggestions
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It is very easy, if you have ever played with legos before you can handle it, they literally snap together

(if you really really dont want to try it, you can get pretty good complete computer prices from tigerdirect.com :))

Read full topic

item.title: Open to suggestions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

the thing is i am 12…and i dont know that…my brother could do that …but i doubt he would.

Read full topic

item.title: Open to suggestions
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

go to newegg.com, buy a computer case, motherboard, processor (AMD not intel), some RAM, and a video card, put it together in 5 minutes, and your all set (and some drives if you dont want to use your old ones)

you can build a computer for $500 dollars that would cost you $3000 dollars to buy from dell

Read full topic
